page.title: 03NW Derby Home Life - Pets
page.content:
All the 138 children at College Primary School were asked who kept pets. There were few families with no pets and several families kept more than one. Here are the results of the survey:
A B C D E F G H I J K L M
Infants 1 9 3 2 6 0 0 2 0 1 0 0 1 15 Infants 2 5 6 1 11 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 20 Infants 3 12 5 6 8 0 1 0 1 1 0 0 2 20 Juniors 1 6 7 8 9 1 0 0 1 3 1 0 0 19 Juniors 2 10 7 3 9 0 0 0 0 3 1 2 2 24 Juniors 3 12 9 8 9 0 0 1 1 2 0 0 2 25 Juniors 4 7 4 7 7 0 0 1 0 5 0 2 0 15
Key: A - dog; B - cat; C - bird; D - fish; E - rat; F - mouse; G - guinea pig; H - hampster; I - rabbit; J - snake; K - chicken; L - frog; M - no. of pupils / class.
